title: Crypto drainer steals $59 million from 63k people in Twitter ad push
description: Google and Twitter ads are promoting sites containing a cryptocurrency drainer named 'MS Drainer' that has already stolen $59 million from 63,210 victims over the past nine months. [...]

title: Lapsus$ hacker behind GTA 6 leak gets indefinite hospital sentence
description: Lapsus$ cybercrime and extortion group member, Arion Kurtaj has been sentenced to life in a 'secure hospital' by a UK judge. Kurtaj who is 18 years of age and autistic is among the primary Lapsus$ threat actors, and was involved in the leak of assets associated with the video game, Grand Theft Auto VI. [...]

title: Microsoft: Hackers target defense firms with new FalseFont malware
description: Microsoft says the APT33 Iranian cyber-espionage group is using recently discovered FalseFont backdoor malware to attack defense contractors worldwide. [...]

title: First American takes IT systems offline after cyberattack
description: First American Financial Corporation, the second-largest title insurance company in the United States, took some of its systems offline today to contain the impact of a cyberattack. [...]

title: Title insurance giant First American offline after cyberattack
description: First American Financial Corporation, the second-largest title insurance company in the United States, took some of its systems offline today to contain the impact of a cyberattack. [...]

title: Microsoft deprecates Defender Application Guard for some Edge users
description: Microsoft is deprecating Defender Application Guard (including the Windows Isolated App Launcher APIs) for Edge for Business users. [...]

title: OpenAI rolls out imperfect fix for ChatGPT data leak flaw
description: OpenAI has mitigated a data exfiltration bug in ChatGPT that could potentially leak conversation details to an external URL. [...]

title: BidenCash darkweb market gives 1.9 million credit cards for free
description: The BidenCash stolen credit card marketplace is giving away 1.9 million credit cards for free via its store to promote itself among cybercriminals. [...]

title: Android malware Chameleon disables Fingerprint Unlock to steal PINs
description: The Chameleon Android banking trojan has re-emerged with a new version that uses a tricky technique to take over devices — disable fingerprint and face unlock to steal device PINs. [...]
